mapper.select: select t.* from t_sys_notify t where `ftype`=1 order by t.createdAt desc limit 1
select * from t_sys_notify m where m.ftype=1 order by m.createdAt desc limit 10

select s.* from t_sys_usernotify t left join t_sys_notify s on t.notify=s.id where t.isRead=0 and t.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.createdAt>date_add(now(), interval -10 day) order BY s.ftype ASC ,s.createdAt DESC limit 4

select s.* from t_sys_usernotify t left join t_sys_notify s on t.notify=s.id where t.isRead=0 and t.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.createdAt>date_add(now(), interval -10 day) order BY s.ftype ASC ,s.createdAt DESC
select max(t.id) id from t_sys_notify t
select t.ftype ,count(*) nums from t_sys_notify t left join t_sys_usernotify u on u.notify=t.id where (t.ftype=3 or t.ftype=2)and u.isRead=0 and u.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR} group by t.ftype
